snippet.title: "Back in 1995" Tester trailer
snippet.description:
Do you like retro graphic indie games?
 
In these days,  many retrospective games were released from indie studios to big publishers.
That's good.
 
But I think, those games are intensive to  8bit or 16bit dot graphics.
 
About 15-20 years ago, I was a video game boy who spent a long time with PlayStation, Sega Saturn.
 
It's my first experience of video games.
The low graphics, early stage polygon games was so excited me.
 
Now in 2015,  You might think it's too early that  called retro about those games.
 
But video game fans in age of 25-35 may feel nostalgic at "those graphics".
 
So, I'm trying to regenerate those days game again.
 
The first trailer is so early version of game, I'll make it more degenerative of graphics, sound and  effects.
 
 See you at Tokyo Indie Fest 2015!
